# drawDraggingDestinationFeedback(in:)

**Instance Method**

Draws the row’s dragging destination feedback when the entire row is a drop target.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func drawDraggingDestinationFeedback(in dirtyRect: NSRect)
```

## Parameters

- **dirtyRect**: The rectangle that requires drawing.

## Discussion

Overriding this method allows an application to draw custom dragging destination feedback when the entire row is a drop target.

This method only is called if [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableRowView/isTargetForDropOperation] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], and is only drawn based on the properties set, such as the group row style.

## Overriding Row View Display Characteristics

- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the row.
- **drawBackground(in:)**: Draws the background of the row in the rectangle.
- **drawSelection(in:)**: Draws the selected row.
- **drawSeparator(in:)**: Draws the horizontal separator between table rows.
